source_caption_data.pre_caption: A full shot frames the animated cat, Tom, in the center of the frame and in the middle ground, sitting on a concrete step while holding a black keyboard. To his right in the middle ground, there is a large cardboard box, with wooden pallets further to the right and black trash bags in the background behind the box. A brick wall and a staircase occupy the background on the left, while the wet, paved ground is visible in the foreground. The right side of the keyboard then breaks off, falling from its position in the middle ground down to the foreground on the right, revealing a cluster of wires. The camera remains stationary at the subject's level throughout the shot.
